external_references.description: Microsoft Threat Intelligence. (2023, May 24). Volt Typhoon targets US critical infrastructure with living-off-the-land techniques. Retrieved July 27, 2023.

external_references.source_name: Joint Cybersecurity Advisory Volt Typhoon June 2023
external_references.description: NSA et al. (2023, May 24). People's Republic of China State-Sponsored Cyber Actor Living off the Land to Evade Detection. Retrieved July 27, 2023.

objects.description: [Volt Typhoon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1017) has used compromised devices and customized versions of open source tools  such as Fast Reverse Proxy (FRP), Earthworm, and [Impacket](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0357) to proxy network traffic.(Citation: Microsoft Volt Typhoon May 2023)(Citation: Joint Cybersecurity Advisory Volt Typhoon June 2023)
